strapiPost.title: FemHealth Founders Inaugural Accelerator Program Nearing Completion
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas-based FemHealth Founders is nearing the end of its first-ever accelerator program focused on womenâ€™s health and wellness, with five participating startups making innovations in gynecology, fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, and trauma-informed care.

  • Local Founder: One of the five participants is a local startup out of Siloam Springs called Function Feedback, founded by Kristen Davidson, which offers customizable EMG biofeedback for pelvic floor physical therapy that can be affordably used in clinics and at home.
  • The Home Stretch: The eight-week program will end on Apr 28, and participants will travel to Northwest Arkansas to meet investors and stakeholders for a two-day retreat at The Collaborative in Bentonville.

Read more in Talk Business & Politics HERE.
